entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming north 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Clearing. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Clearing. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 4 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023
